profile:
With over 10 years experience, Tilestars has successfully completed hundreds of projects throughout Toronto area .Our skilled staff work on both new and remodeling jobs and display the finest quality workmanship. Our projects include commercial and residential jobs involving ceramic tile, slate, marble,glass tile, for kitchens, baths, foyers, sunrooms, and patios. We are GTA's award winning tile installers and tile finishers. We look forward to working on your next tile project. Your project is our showroom! 
Feel free to get your free estimate

416-8253359

Dmitri

profile:
If you want QUALITY, CREATIVITY, RELIABILITY, and an overall ENJOYABLE experience, Purple Properties is the company you're looking for! For nearly 24 years now we have grown to understand what is needed in our market space, now allowing us to service happy clients all over the GTA.  

We have enjoyed producing an impressive body of work, lead by the Vision of our clients. The results naturally happen based on our core principles of PASSION, EXCELLENCE, & COMMITMENT. Our work and knowledge base is extremely diverse. We love to use STONE, HORTICULTURE, WOOD, TILES,  PAINTS along with other materials that become our art, your property being the canvas. Whether your project is interior or exterior, we can help! We look forward to co-creating with you in your next project! 

Purple Properties is fully licensed, insured, and up to date with WSIB. Our insurance and license are valid in the GTA for Interior and exterior projects.

Process:

Call for free estimate: 416-899-1572

Please visit our website at: www.purpleproperties.ca

profile:
Choosing a contractor is not something that should be taken lightly. 
Fortunately, Duralock Interlocking does not  take our work lightly, either.

When we take on a project, we treat your home as if it were our own; with the respect and effort it deserves. Our experienced professionals cut no corners, take no risks, and leave no stone unturned in crafting landscapes that are just as durable as they are beautiful. 

We’re serious about our work, and it shows. From the very first consultation to the very last stone, DuraLock is dedicated to providing excellence in landscaping solutions. Specializing in interlock stone installations, we are renown for our unparalleled work ethic and high quality installations of driveways, walkways, patios, steps and retaining walls. 

The Process:  

***

1) FREE estimate at your home by one of our Design Specialists
2) Custom design plan developed to maximize your space
3) Installation by trained & courteous professionals 
4) Increased value and curb envy of your home

No matter what your canvas looks like, DuraLock will ensure that the finished project is something that captures your vision, and the attention of your neighbours. Visit our website at or call us at 1-877-895-LOCK and watch your dreams take shape beneath your feet.

profile:
The Home Improvement Group is the premier One Stop Shop for all of your home and office renovations needs.  We have multiple divisions such as Perfect Painter, Affinity Renovations, Perfect Handyman and formally  Mr. Rescue to service all your needs. 

We service work form $400.00 to $500,000.00+ from our Painter and Handyman of the Day Service to  Home Additions and Major Renovation and Structural work.   We want to earn your trust and as a family owned business that delivers on providing outstanding home/office renovation work. 

Not convinced we have enough renovation reviews please see Perfect Painters & Home Renovations Services for a more detailed list on reviews.

We have a commitment to Quality work and dealing with a no risk contractor and we will always compete for your business.


We have also expanded our service areas to include Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Vaughan, Markham, Newmark, Aurora, Stouffville, Pickering and Oshawa.

Call or email us at sales@thig.pro for all your renovation needs

profile:
Vule Tile

Tile & Stone Contractors, ceramic marble, granite, porcelin, travertine, glass, slate, limestone, tile installation

If you can envision it, chances are you can create it with us. The options are almost limitless. Do you need both design flexibility and elegance? A material that's great for work or play? A surface that can stand up to the challenges of time and punishing customers or substances? We provide you with a wide selection of distributors and brand names from which to make your tile choices. We can help you get ideas by providing picture albums filled with pictures of projects that we have completed in virtually any kind of tile and/or marble applications. Are you looking for finishing touches like inlays and edge treatments? Or dramatic, thermoformed shapes that can engage, excite and express?
VULE TILE can provide a touch of durable and practical style to any room in your home or office.

profile: As a family owned and operated business, The Marble Clinic has over 30 years experience in the field of natural stone protection and restoration - and with that experience our highly knowledgeable staff is able to provide the best outcome for your natural stone. Specializing in the fields of protection, restoration as well as maintenance. Each project has individual needs and The Marble Clinics team of experts work to produce top quality results. We offer the following services: Marble Cleaning: Remove dirt and dust stuck in the stone surface or in the grout lines – this will not remove scratches or etching alone. Wax Stripping: The use of wax and topical coatings can damage natural stone over time, and causes yellowing after short periods of heavy traffic; The Marble Clinic can remove topical coatings from any natural stone to prepare it for proper restoration and sealing techniques. Stone Grinding: This is the most common restoration technique and will remove deep scratches, lippage, etching, white stun marks and yellowing. It is also used to remove epoxy from chip and crack repairs. Marble Polishing: Through mechanical polishing methods, natural stone acquires a high lustre and reflects natural light – it therefore does not need topical coatings or wax to achieve a desired shine. Marble Honing: Will remove minor etching on low lustre stone surfaces, and give the surface a clean uniform finish without the polished look. Finish Alteration: The Marble Clinic can change the appearance of a natural stones finish; from honed to polished, polished to honed, and everything in-between. Countertop Seam-Polishing: Visible counter top seams can be filled with epoxy based resins, ground and polished or honed to match the stone colour and virtually disappear. Chip and Crack Repair: Chips and cracks in any natural stone can be filled with coloured epoxy resin and refinished to match the surrounding material. Grout Cleaning and Sealing: Over time grout accumulates dirt and becomes quite dirty. Grout can be cleaned and sealed to improve the floors beauty and facilitate easier maintenance cleaning. Grout Colouring: An easy way to change the look and feel of a tile floor. Stone Sealing: All natural stone should be professionally cleaned and sealed to increase the longevity of the material and repel dark staining solutions. Colour Enhancing: Using enhancing impregnators on flamed or textured material is an excellent way to protect your stone and bring it back to life. Table Repair: Our expert technicians can repair most tables, mantals, fireplace’s, statues or fountains – so long as it is a relatively clean break. Stone Maintenance: Specially formulated compounds used on an annual or semi-annual basis keep any surface in high traffic areas looking good year round.

profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:
Trinity Marble Inc. is a custom stone surface company for the residential sector. Our services include slab inventory, custom templating, handcrafted fabrication and professional installation of all natural stone surfaces as well as many quartz surfaces. Our professional and dedicated sales staff, complemented by our experienced fabrication and installation personnel, are ready to deliver quality projects with industry-leading delivery times without sacrificing quality and service.
We specialize in the manufacturing of Kitchen Countertop, marble Vanities, Tub Surrounds, Fireplace Surround, Flooring, and many other custom stone applications. From the initial design phase and pricing to stone selection, our team of professionals will work with you to create breathtaking custom stone surfaces that will exceed your expectations as well as add value to your home.

profile:
LUNAC Flooring is a family owned and operated business in Ontario. We specialize in tile, stone, ceramic, laminate, and vinyl floor installation. In addition, we provide service for bath, shower, backsplash and fireplace tile/stone installation. 

The primary contractor, Marko, has been in the business since 2018, however it wasn't until 2020 that he pursued this venture on his own. 

LUNAC Flooring offers top of the industry techniques and materials for all installations regardless of project size and/or complexity. We work with you to determine pricing that fits your budget, and our consultations are free of charge.

Our primary focus is to establish and maintain relationships built on transparency and superior workmanship. Come home to quality!

If this sounds like something that you've been looking for, connect with us, and allow us to bring your vision to life!

Tile, stone, ceramic, vinyl and laminate floor installation.
Backsplash, shower, bath and fireplace tile/stone installation.

profile:
Our offer is addressed to individual and institutional clients interested in comprehensive service and the highest quality of orders.
Meeting your expectations, saving your time, and thus money and intangible – but probably the most important aspects of life, which are peace and health – we carry out this seemingly simple task, which is the installation of tiles, slabs, stone, etc.
All this to achieve the intended end result, which is the completion of the project with the utmost care and only to the highest standards of services. Our many years of experience have led us to the highest precision and quality of our services.
services:
01.	Tiling services
We provide comprehensive services consisting in laying floor and wall tiles, porcelain, ceramic and glass for the use of private persons, entrepreneurs and developers.

02.	Natural
Stone Installation.
Natural stone is an ideal decoration for those who appreciate classic beauty and references to nature in interior design. What’s more, it is a very universal material that will work both in interiors – e.g. as a kitchen or living room decoration, but also outside – as a facade or fence covering.

03.	Complete Bathroom
Renovation
Bathroom finishing is a very important and at the same time the basic element of any major renovation or interior finishing. The way in which we arrange our bathroom depends basically on only one factor, namely – the size of the bathroom. If you need to connect a hydraulic or other installation – we will also take care of that for you!
project_minimum: No job is too small or big

profile:
We provide all kind of stone products such as kitchen countertops, full backsplash, vanity top, fireplace surroundings also table top. Our company offer competitive pricing, free measuring around the GTA as well as free estimates.
All of our materials are sourced, processed and manufactured to the highest possible standards.
We're able to price our works more competitively than some larger companies who use lifestyle and design as justification for higher prices, where in fact customers are only paying extra to support large marketing campaigns. We cut out the middle man, passing on those savings directly to our customers.
